hero.subtitle: Protect your privacy before posting on Vinted, eBay, or Depop.

marketing.vinted_title: Your listing photos reveal your home address.
marketing.vinted_text_1: Every photo taken with your smartphone embeds your exact GPS coordinates, date, time, and phone model.
marketing.vinted_text_2: GhostMeta removes all metadata in one click. Nothing is sent to the internet.
marketing.batch_lock_desc: In free mode, clean photos one by one (unlimited). The Pro Pack unlocks batch processing and ZIP export.

info.why_desc: Every photo contains invisible trackers (EXIF, GPS).
info.geo_desc: Your exact home address is embedded in the file.
info.meta_desc: Date, time, and phone model are recorded.
info.privacy_desc: Your photos never leave your device.
info.q1: Are my photos sent to a server?
info.a1: No. All processing happens locally in your browser.
info.a2: We support JPEG, PNG, WEBP, and HEIC.
info.a3: Everything: GPS, EXIF, XMP, IPTC, and embedded thumbnails.
info.a4: No, the image is cleaned without destructive re-compression.
info.a5: To support development while keeping the tool ad-free.
info.a6: Not always, and often only after storing the original on their servers.
